title: Tonight's going to be a good night ;)
body: I hand picked this myself when I was in japan, she can finally use it at the 5 star hotel we are going to tonight ;) #living

replies.body: You have a thing for children? Ew.

> [{quoted}](name=Kartoffeln,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hjQbEv4G,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-12T02:01:59.641+0000)
>
> You have a thing for children? Ew.

Hahaha, she actually requested it, it was a pretty fun expriance going though the 8 story adult shop in Akihabara, they literally had everything you could imagine in that store :p

> [{quoted}](name=Pettanko,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hjQbEv4G,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-01-12T02:08:46.439+0000)
>
> Hahaha, she actually requested it, it was a pretty fun expriance going though the 8 story adult shop in Akihabara, they literally had everything you could imagine in that store :p

Haha, I am just taking the piss. 8 Stories though?? That is ridiculous.
